ModMetaData.name: [PL] Comfortable Fishing
ModMetaData.author: ProgrammerLily
ModMetaData.description:
Enhances fishing by allowing pawns to fish from chairs for bonus yield and speed. Works with any chair from any mod.
Features: - Pawns get fishing bonuses when sitting on chairs - Configurable yield and speed multipliers - Works with modded chairs automatically - Optional requirement for chairs to be in fishing zones - Pawns will prefer chairs when available for fishing
The mod automatically detects any chair (anything with isSittable property) from any mod, making it fully compatible with furniture mods.
